name: Kenshi of the Snow
description:
This is the third build of my first Unity game called Kenshi of the Snow, it is a simple endless runner featuring a little ninja swordsman!

How to install - 

To install Kenshi of the Snow simply click the download button and when the .zip file has downloaded right-click on it and extract all the contents, from here just double-click the file ending with .exe and the game will open.

How to play - 

Kenshi of the Snow is an endless runner game which means the character will run automatically, all you have to do is jump from platform to platform without falling or hitting any spikes.

JUMP and DOUBLE JUMP - To jump press SPACE and hold SPACE for a long jump, you can also press/hold space a second time while mid-air to perform a double jump.

Coins - The golden coins found throughout the game offer the player a 100 point bonus every time they are collected.

Spikes - Coming into contact with a spike will result in a game over.
